Allow to parse over a multi fasta file, and iterate over it

Warning

The sequences order is not guarantee.

  • dist_threshold (int) â€“ The minimum length for a replicon to be considered as circular. Under this threshold even the provided topology is â€˜circularâ€™ the computation will be done with a â€˜linearâ€™ topology.
